name: Ex Raizeol
desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by sending 1 Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck to the GY. If you do, you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Rank 4 Xyz Monsters. You can only Special Summon "Ex Raizeol" once per turn this way. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned and you do not control any face-up monsters, other than Level/Rank 4 monsters: You can add 1 FIRE Thunder monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Ex Raizeol" once per turn.
